The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Please click here to download the letter with the curriculum information for all subjects for this Autumn Term 2013. In January a new curriculum letter will go home containing information for the Spring Term and a final letter will go home in April with details for the Summer Term.
If you have any questions pertaining to the information contained in this curriculum letter, please contact the relevant teachers of each subject.
Key dates for this term:
Wednesday 2nd September 6:00pm Meet the Teacher – Upper Campus
Monday 16th – Friday 20th September Residential Trips Y7-11
Tuesday 17th September ASAs Begin
Monday 7th October UC Photography Competition Begins
Monday 21st October Half Term
Friday 25th October Y7-11 Interim Reports Issued
Wednesday 13th December ASAs End
Wednesday 4th December UC Recitals Evening
Friday 6th December Y7-11 Term 1 Reports Issued
Tuesday 10th December Y7-11 PTCs
Wednesday 11th December Y7-11 PTCs
Wednesday 18th December Christmas Carol Concert
Friday 20th December School Ends – Noon Finish
Kind regards
Mrs. Hamilton
Deputy Head of Secondary
The International School of Moscow
